title: RITO PLZ

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: when you go 6/0/7 as j4 and get a B

replies.body:
It could have been your CS or vision score that played a big part in not getting an S, or it could have just been that other people using {{champion:59}} in the lane you did simply have a better score. 

There isn't a flat grading system for Mastery Scores, you're being compared to others that used the same champ in the lane you chose.

Thank you for such a concise and simple answer.
Guess im just bad then {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
